name: Forest Gnome Scout
description: The Forest Gnome Scout is a medium humanoid with keen sensory abilities, well-suited for stealthy operations and ranged attacks in forest environments.
memorable: Excels in stealth and surprise attacks, using illusions to confuse foes.
goals: Typically seeks to control the battlefield and deceive enemies through clever tactics.
relations: Can communicate with Small and Tiny beasts.
strengths: High dexterity enabling effective stealth and ranged combat; keen hearing and sight with advantage on related checks.
weaknesses: Low hit points making it fragile in direct confrontations.
attacks: Wields a shortsword for melee attacks and a longbow for ranged attacks, adept at staying hidden.
most_powerful_ability: Can cast blur, disguise self, and major image, enhancing its stealth and trickery.
senses: Has passive perception of 16, providing exceptional awareness.
skills: Proficient in stealth, with a +5 bonus, making it very effective in avoiding detection.
additional_information: Innately casts spells without material components
spellcasting: Can cast blur, disguise self, and major image once each per long rest.
test_queries: tactical forest scout that uses illusions
agile humanoid that communicates with animals
forest creature that excels in ranged attacks
